title: The Best Of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best Of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On the holiday edition of The Best Of The Dan Patrick Show:  Doug Gottlieb and Ryan Hollins fill in for Dan.  They breakdown how the Celtics were able to go into Miami and beat the Heat to advance to the NBA Finals.  

Doug and Ryan give their thoughts on the Lakers hiring Darvin Ham as their new head coach.  Doug describes the craziest story of the weekend, and Ryan weighs in on Tommy Pham slapping Joc Pederson over a text message/Fantasy Football incident.  

NBA Analyst and former NBA champion Antonio Daniels joins Ryan and Doug to discuss the NBA Finals matchup, talk about the direction the game is going in, and to hit on other major NBA topics this holiday weekend. 

#douggottliebshow 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
